summary: Add´s a Unique 1H Sword, a 2H version and a Dagger to your game.
descriptionHtml:
my other mod :3 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51609/?

[CENTER][IMG]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Features:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

[youtube]TAbedBrFVqI[/youtube] [youtube]ykuo280oM9o[/youtube]
[youtube]hVGZ4LqA8_k[/youtube] [youtube]xHAyzTaBL4c[/youtube]
videos by Slothability and izon87604, hodilton, seriezs thanks dude´s :)

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Description:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

Original Design by: http://www.fableblades.com/Hirl_i_Gilith.html

At the moment you can download a craftable Version to find under Category Steel, Ebony smithing perk is required because too stronk.

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Install:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your SkyrimData folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher or your mod manager of choice and check the Hirl Craftable.esp

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Uninstall:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod


[CENTER][IMG]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/IMG][/CENTER]


Do NOT modify/reupload/edit/sell any asset in this mod without my permission. Have fun!
author: standalone09
